RelatedSentence: Police would not disclose any of the details regarding the victim out of concern for her safety .
A day after his arrest Raposo retired from the Fall River Police Department .
Fall River Police Chief Daniel Racine said he has suspended Raposo 's license to carry and finds the incident disturbing .
